capabilities.name: getUIComponents
capabilities.description: 获取所有 Element Plus 组件列表

capabilities.name: getComponentProps
capabilities.description: 获取指定组件的属性和 API

capabilities.name: getThemeVars
capabilities.description: 获取 Element Plus 的主题变量列表

capabilities.name: getBasic
capabilities.description: 获取 Button, Border, Color, Container, Icon, Layout, Link, Text, Scrollbar, Space, Typography 组件的详细信息

capabilities.name: getThemeDefault
capabilities.description: 获取 Element Plus 的默认主题配置

capabilities.name: getConfiguration
capabilities.description: 获取 ConfigProvider 组件的详细信息

capabilities.name: getColorSystem
capabilities.description: 获取 Element Plus 的颜色系统配置

capabilities.name: getForm
capabilities.description: 获取 Autocomplete, Cascader, Checkbox, ColorPicker, DatePicker, DateTimePicker, Form, Input, InputNumber, InputTag, Mention, Radio, Rate, Select, SelectV2, Slider, Switch, TimePicker, TimeSelect, Transfer, TreeSelect, Upload 组件的详细信息

capabilities.name: customizeTheme
capabilities.description: 自定义 Element Plus 主题配置

capabilities.name: getData
capabilities.description: 获取 Avatar, Badge, Calendar, Card, Carousel, Collapse, Descriptions, Empty, Image, InfiniteScroll, Pagination, Progress, Result, Skeleton, Table, TableV2, Tag, Timeline, Tour, Tree, TreeV2, Statistic, Segmented 组件的详细信息

capabilities.name: getNavigation
capabilities.description: 获取 Affix, Anchor, Backtop, Breadcrumb, Dropdown, Menu, PageHeader, Steps, Tabs 组件的详细信息

capabilities.name: getFeedback
capabilities.description: 获取 Alert, Dialog, Drawer, Loading, Message, MessageBox, Notification, Popconfirm, Popover, Tooltip 组件的详细信息

capabilities.name: getOthers
capabilities.description: 获取 Divider, Watermark 组件的详细信息
